Special Thanks

I want to say a special thanks to Gregory Brown, whose [Ruby Mendicant](http://rubymendicant.com) project was part of the insperation for this project. I may never have believed this might work if it wasn't for you. I want to thank [Patrick Crowley](http://mokolabs.com) and [Nick Zardozny](http://beyondthepath.com) for letting me bounce the initial idea around with them, your enthusiasim was really motivating.
